argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | setsms.x | |- ( ph -> X = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 2 |  | setsms.d | |- ( ph -> D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | setsms.k | |- ( ph -> K = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_baseid | |- Base = Slot ( Base ` ndx ) |
| 5 |  | #P_1re | |- 1 e. RR |
| 6 |  | #P_1lt9 | |- 1 < 9 |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ltneii | |- 1 =/= 9 |
| 8 |  | #P_basendx | |- ( Base ` ndx ) = 1 |
| 9 |  | #P_tsetndx | |- ( TopSet ` ndx ) = 9 |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_neeq12i | |- ( ( Base ` ndx ) =/= ( TopSet ` ndx ) <-> 1 =/= 9 ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mpbir | |- ( Base ` ndx ) =/= ( TopSet ` ndx ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_setsnid | |- ( Base ` M ) = ( Base ` ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
| 13 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 1, 13 | #P_3eqtr4a | |- ( ph -> X = ( Base ` K ) ) |
